ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: twisting troubles
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh...your system is almost identical to mine..:) I too only recently upgraded. Makes a hell of a difference doesnt it..:) ... when I ... the ... and I
ygData.messageBody:
Heh...your system is almost identical to mine..:)
I too only recently upgraded.

Makes a hell of a difference doesnt it..:)


>
> Now Ive upgraded to a:
> AMD Athlon 550MHz. (Running 605 at the moment.. Should be able to do 750
when I
> get a GFD)
> 128Mb RAM
> ASUS Geforce V6800
> SBlive
> ISDN
> Particle density high (I suspect I will turn it down once I get enough of
the
> flashy lights)
> Offcourse there is a world of difference (I only upgraded because of RoK)
and I
> can keep 3 songs up with little effort..
>
> Well If I had your system I would get more RAM atleast up to 128Mb
> and then wait and see how good RoK will work..
>
> Musiker Silverdrum bard, 33th level, bertox
>
>
